attributes.review: The software of this app is simply horrendous. All I wanted to do was get updates on events regarding the best president in history, and instead i got a whole lot of trouble. The app constantly kicked me out, would rarely show relevant information and would often times simply not work. Blank screens when i looked for info about events, constant nagging for me to turn on notifications and to share with friends, and a lack of decent programming made this app horrendous. Never use this app if itâ€™s at all possible.
